scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports spec/gemoji.spec.js
scripts.lint: npm run-script lint-api && npm run-script lint-test && npm run-script lint-style
scripts.lint-api: node_modules/.bin/eslint index.js build-data.js --env node --env browser --rule 'quotes: [2, single]'
scripts.lint-test: node_modules/.bin/eslint spec/gemoji.spec.js --env node --env mocha --rule 'quotes: [2, single], no-loop-func: false'
scripts.prepublish: npm run scrape-data && npm run build-data && npm run build-supported-gemoji
scripts.make: npm run-script lint && npm run-script coverage && npm run build-supported-gemoji
